verses.text: \w For|strong="H1732"\w* \w the|strong="H1732"\w* choirmaster. \w A|strong="H3068"\w* \w Psalm|strong="H4210"\w* \w of|strong="H4210"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*. \w May|strong="H1732"\w* \w the|strong="H1732"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* answer you \w in|strong="H1732"\w* \w the|strong="H1732"\w* day \w of|strong="H4210"\w* trouble; \w may|strong="H1732"\w* \w the|strong="H1732"\w* name \w of|strong="H4210"\w* \w the|strong="H1732"\w* God \w of|strong="H4210"\w* Jacob protect you.

\w May|strong="H3068"\w* \w He|strong="H3117"\w* send \w you|strong="H3117"\w* \w help|strong="H6030"\w* \w from|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* sanctuary \w and|strong="H3068"\w* sustain \w you|strong="H3117"\w* \w from|strong="H3117"\w* Zion.

May \w He|strong="H7971"\w* remember \w all|strong="H7971"\w* \w your|strong="H7971"\w* \w gifts|strong="H6944"\w* \w and|strong="H7971"\w* look favorably \w on|strong="H7971"\w* \w your|strong="H7971"\w* burnt offerings. Selah

\w May|strong="H2142"\w* \w He|strong="H3605"\w* give \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* desires \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* heart \w and|strong="H5930"\w* \w make|strong="H2142"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* plans succeed.

\w May|strong="H5414"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* shout \w for|strong="H3605"\w* joy \w at|strong="H5414"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* victory \w and|strong="H6098"\w* \w raise|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* banner \w in|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* name \w of|strong="H4390"\w* \w our|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H5414"\w*. \w May|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w grant|strong="H5414"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* petitions.

Now \w I|strong="H3068"\w* know \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* saves \w His|strong="H3605"\w* anointed; \w He|strong="H3068"\w* answers \w him|strong="H3605"\w* \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w His|strong="H3605"\w* holy heaven \w with|strong="H4390"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w saving|strong="H3444"\w* power \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w His|strong="H3605"\w* \w right|strong="H3068"\w* hand.

Some trust \w in|strong="H3068"\w* chariots \w and|strong="H3068"\w* others \w in|strong="H3068"\w* horses, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* trust \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* name \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*.
\w They|strong="H3068"\w* collapse \w and|strong="H3068"\w* fall, \w but|strong="H3068"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* rise up \w and|strong="H3068"\w* stand firm.
\w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, save \w the|strong="H6965"\w* king. Answer us \w on|strong="H5307"\w* \w the|strong="H6965"\w* day \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w call|strong="H5749"\w*.
